Entries.FS_AlexandriaMail1: Hey!^When you have time, stop by the cafe, I want to talk to you.  ^^   -Alexandria[#]A Note From Alexandria
Entries.FS_IslaMail4: Hi hi hi!^^Oh, I think I wrote this wrong.^^Isla[#]A Note from Isla?
Entries.FS_MakenaMail8: @!^^You were right!^^Isla and I talked to our parents and they agreed we are old enough to have our own rooms! I can't wait to show you mine!^^Makena[#]A Note From Makena
Entries.FS_MakenaMail10: Dear @^^I wanted to thank you again for your help getting our rooms sorted. I find I'm even enjoying Isla's company again!^^Anyway, I wanted to send you this as a thank you.^Makena %item object 74 1 %%[#]Makena's Thank You
Entries.FS_IslaMail10: @,^^Dad said I had to send you a thank you.^I think he's still mad about the wallpaper mess.^But thank you for helping with our rooms.^^Isla^^PS Makena is being nice to me again. It's weird.^^Anyway, I'm sending a little gift as a thank you. %item object 848 10 %%[#]Isla's Thank You
Entries.FS_FionaMail2: My new friend!^^I have enjoyed speaking to you about the history of our lovely town. I hope to see more of you in the future. I am attaching one of the stones that my father found back when he was working at the mine near town.^^     -Fiona %item object 569 1 %%[#]Fiona's New Friend
Entries.FS_FionaMail6: Hello again, @!^^These seeds grow my favorite flowers. Try some!^^     -Fiona %item object 453 10 %%[#]Seeds from Fiona
Entries.FS_FionaMail8: My dear farmer, @.&^^ hope you can make seeds from fruit because these plants are just so satisfying to grow!^^     -Fiona %item object 454 1 %%[#]Fiona's Special Seeds
Entries.FS_FionaMail10: My good friend!^^I knew when I first met you that you would be a wonderful addition to our town. I hope you will use the attached gift wisely.^^     -Fiona %item object 107 1 %%[#]Fiona's Gift
Entries.FS_MarinaMail2: It has been so nice getting to know you better. I am glad you are enjoying your time in our town. If you hold this shell up to your ear, you can hear the sounds that remind me of home!^^     -Marina %item object 392 1 %%[#]Marina's Note
Entries.FS_MarinaMail4: I have enjoyed our talks so much! It is good to know someone else who likes collecting the items that wash up on the seashore. Each one has a different story to tell if you listen. Here is one of my favorites. So shiny!^^     -Marina %item object 394 1 %%[#]Marina's Shell
Entries.FS_HelmutMail4: Hello, friend!!^^I wanted to thank you for dropping by the Pickle Shop! Heres a little something Ive been working on. Hope you enjoy!^^     -Helmut %item object 342 1 %%[#]Helmut's Pickles
Entries.FS_HelmutMail8: Hello, friend!!^^We were talking about new pickle product ideas the other day and I just wanted to send you this to sample. Next time youre in Stoffton stop by and let me know what you think!^^     -Helmut %item object 342 1 %%[#]Helmut's New Pickles
Entries.FS_FelixMail4: Good day, @:^^I was working on a new arrangement the other day and it reminded me of the last time you were in the store. I hope you enjoy these!^^     -Felix %item object 722 3 %%[#]Flowers from Felix
Entries.FS_TomasMail8: Dear @:^^I didnt mean to make things awkward outside Yoba Temple the other day. To apologize, Id like to give you this. Hope we are on the up-and-up!^^     -Tomas %item object 125 1 %%[#]Apology from Tomas
Entries.FS_RolfMail2: Dear @:^^I've given up on my dream of making pickles. I think my Uncle has that market cornered.^^     -Rolf %item bigobject 15 %%[#]Rolf's Hobby
Entries.FS_RolfMail4: Dear @:^^Well, that didn't go as planned. Dad says I can't have these in the house anymore...^^     -Rolf %item bigobject 13 %%[#]Rolf's Second Hobby
Entries.FS_RolfMail6: Dear @:^^Making cheese is far more difficult than I anticipated. Maybe you can use this?^^     -Rolf %item bigobject 16 %%[#]Rolf's Third Hobby
Entries.FS_RolfMail8: Dear @:^^I guess I'll have to leave the farming to you...^^     -Rolf %item bigobject 25 %%[#]Rolf's Fourth Hobby
Entries.FS_XenMail10: Hey @,^^I'm back visiting my family again. Every time I go back I am shocked at how big my brother has gotten. Apparently 13 year olds grow like weeds.^^But that's not why I'm writing to you. My mom and dad gave me this paper when I started talking about how important you are to me. Not that long form letters have ever been my strength, but you gotta try everything else once right?^^Sorry, I am just trying to say thank you. You helped me reconnect with my family, and you are the best just in general. I am so glad that we met.^^I made you something. I hope that it survived postage. Go easy on me, I'm still leveling my cooking skill.^^     -Xen %item object 203 1 %%[#]A Letter from Xen
Entries.FS_GerhardMail10: Dear @:^^In a lengthy conversation with Aluna weve concluded you are a gifted master maze navigatora rare skill indeed! This deserves appropriate recognition having accomplished such a renown achievement! Attached you will find a small token to acknowledge your incredible skill!^^     -Gerhard %item object 106 1 %%[#]Gerhard's Note
Entries.FS_GerhardMail2: @:^^I appreciate you visiting our humble home recently. To thank you for your visit Ive included a small gift as a memento of your tour.^^     -Gerhard^^P.S. I already have too many of these so getting rid of one was no bother. Dont think it too much. %item object 73 1 %%[#]Gerhard's Gift
Entries.FS_GerhardMail4: @:^^I was thinking about your farm today and wondering if you ever thought of selling. Im always in the market for good real estate. If youd ever consider my offer, please let me know. In the mean time, Ive included this for you to put in a prominent place in your home as a visual reminder of my interest.^^     -Gerhard %item object 564 1 %%[#]Gerhard's Opal
Entries.FS_OttoMail4: @:^^It was good to talk to you the other day. I want to thank you for hearing me out. I hope this can help with your farming...^^     -Otto %item object 369 10 %%[#]Otto's Note
Entries.FS_OttoMail10: @:^^Thanks for dropping by the other day. Things get busy at the ranch and I forget my manners. Ive enclosed something that I hope will help you with your farm.^^     -Otto %item object 915 2 %%[#]Otto's Gift
Entries.FS_FelixMail8: Dear @:^^My arrangements are always evolving and getting better. Sending this along just in case a 'special someone' comes into your life.^^     -Felix %item object 458 1 %%[#]Felix's Gift
Entries.FS_TomasMail4: @,^^I dont know how much technology you use on the farm, but thought I would send this along just in case it came in handy.^^     -Tomas %item object 787 1 %%[#]Tomas's Gift
Entries.FS_TomasMail10: @,^^I thought you might find this useful on the farm...^^     -Tomas %item bigobject 239 %%[#]A Gift from Tomas
Entries.FS_LeanderMail2: Hey @^^I didnt mean to be so rude the other day. Lexi says Im just too gruff. Apologies.^^     -Leander %item object 770 5 %%[#]Leander's Note
Entries.FS_RhysMail4: Dear @,^^Thanks for dropping by the store the other day! Theres a big game coming up, so I thought you could use this! Stop by the Package Store if you want to buy more!^^     -Rhys %item object 346 1 %%[#]Note from Rhys
Entries.FS_ErikMail4: Good day! I was thinking about your farm today and made me think this might be useful. I never use it. Hope it helps!^^     -Erik %item object 681 1 %%[#]Note from Erik
Entries.FS_IgnasMail4: Hello, Farmer!^^As two people in ancient professions, I thought I  would send you a little something to let you know I was thinking of you.^^     -Ignas %item object 487 20 %%[#]Note from Ignas
Entries.FS_WillMail8: Hey @,^^When you have time, would you come by my place? I have something I'd like to share with you. That sounded ominous, it's not. I promise.^^     -Will[#]Note from Will
Entries.FS_JulianaMail10: @,^^You've become such a good friend. I want to invite you to a special dinner. Meet me at the Boarding House between 7 pm and 9 pm.^^     -Juliana[#]Juliana's Invitation
Entries.FS_LexiMail6: @,^^Thanks again for all your help cleaning up. I really appreciate it.^^     -Lexi %item object 236 1 %%[#]Lexi's Note
Entries.FS_BrinaMail2: I'm so happy to have met you, @.^^I hope we can spend more time talking to each other. I wanted to share with you one of my favorite quotes by Plato:^^'Astronomy compels the soul to look upward, and leads us from this world to another.'^^Anyway, hope you are well, and if you aren't, try some vinegar! It always helps me!^^     Brina %item object 419 1 %%[#]A Quote from Brina
Entries.FS_BrinaMail4: Hi, @.^^The stars are quite favorable at this time of year. Could you meet me up by the mill after 10:00 pm?^^Oh! If the weather is bad, wait until it clears up.^^     Brina[#]Stars with Brina
Entries.FS_BrinaMail6: Hi, @.^^Could you meet me at my dad's pickle shop after 3:00 pm?^^     Brina[#]Preserves by Brina
Entries.FS_BrinaMail8: Hi, @.^^Could you meet me outside my grandmother Fiona's old cottage after 6:00 pm? It's down near the Schafer farm.^^     Brina[#]Brina's History
Entries.FS_AlunaMail10: @^^I'm so glad I've gotten to know you. The last shipment from my parents included a box of these. I thought you might be able to use some of them.^^     Aluna %item object 499 5 %%[#]A Gift from Aluna

Entries.11666006/f EbbeFS 2500: spaceMusic/13 18/farmer 9 23 1 EbbeFS 13 17 2/skippable/pause 1000/speed farmer 3/move farmer 4 0 1 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 300/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/speak EbbeFS "Oh! @! Um, you're out and about!$3"/speak EbbeFS "I was hoping to meet you...$10"/speak EbbeFS "The, um, forecast said we were gonna have shooting stars tonight...$1"/speak EbbeFS "$q -1 null#I was hoping you'd like to join me.$10#$r -1 10 event10_ofCourse#Of course I do!#$r -1 50 event10_always#I always want to spend time with you.#$r -1 -250 event10_busy#I'm busy."/fork noStarsEbbe/speak EbbeFS "I packed us some snacks, I hope you like candied popcorn!$8"/fade/message "You and Ebbe had a lovely night under the stars."/end
Entries.noStarsEbbe: faceDirection EbbeFS 3/emote EbbeFS 12/end dialogue EbbeFS "I can't believe you..."
Entries.11666011/f AlexandriaFS 2500: tribal/13 18/farmer 9 23 1 AlexandriaFS 13 17 2/skippable/pause 1000/speed farmer 3/move farmer 4 0 1 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 300/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/speak AlexandriaFS "@! Hey!"/emote farmer 8/speak AlexandriaFS "I had some tickets and wondered if you'd like to go to a concert with me?$6"/speak AlexandriaFS "I-um- don't normally feel like sharing my interests, but you- well- you- I'm gonna start over.$7"/speak AlexandriaFS "I really like you and I want to take you with me.$4"/speak AlexandriaFS "$q -1 null#Anyway. Do you want to? Come with me?#$r -1 50 event10_Totally#Yeah! Totally!#$r -1 0 event10_Thanks#Thanks, I guess I can try it.#$r -1 -500 event10_mean#I don't see why I would like some of your music."/fork noConcertAlexandria/fade/message "You and Alexandria had a lovely time at the concert."/end
Entries.noConcertAlexandria: faceDirection AlexandriaFS 3/emote AlexandriaFS 12/end dialogue AlexandriaFS "I can't believe you..."
Entries.11666050/f VashaFS 2000: SunRoom/13 18/farmer 9 23 1 VashaFS 13 17 2/skippable/pause 1000/speed farmer 3/move farmer 4 0 1 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 300/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/speak VashaFS "Hello, I um- came to see you. Obviously. You could see that.$4"/speak VashaFS "Sorry, you make me feel a bit- well- tongue tied."/speak VashaFS "I actually came to give you a gift. Since we started dating, I just wanted you to know how much you mean to me.$1"/speak VashaFS "So erhm.. here you go. I was told this might be useful.[645]"/speak VashaFS "$q -1 null#You know... I havn't yet seen your abode, would you care to give me a tour?#$r -1 50 event_OfCourse#Of course!#$r -1 -10 event_RatherNot#I'd rather not.#$r -1 0 event_MaybeTomorrow#Maybe tomorrow?"/end
Entries.11666118/f BrinaFS 2500: continue/13 18/farmer 9 23 1 BrinaFS 13 17 2/skippable/pause 1000/speed farmer 3/move farmer 4 0 1 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/playSound grassyStep/pause 300/playSound grassyStep/pause 600/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 1000/speak BrinaFS "$q -1 null#Hi, @! The Zuzu Observatory has a special exhibit tonight! I have tickets for us!$3#$r -1 100 event_letsGo#Great! Let's go!#$r -1 -10 event_maybe#Maybe?#$r -1 -250 event_noThankYou#No thank you."/fork noObservatoryBrina/fade/message "So many stars to see, so little time."/end
